quickly actually any of you graduating

line but I'm not here to give you the

Millennials we try to do that

a sense of

will a couple years in some big

nearly everyone else wanted to

this was their startup dream come true
and it tore our company

for the rest of my
life relationships were so frayed that
within a year or so every single person

gone that was my hardest time leading

the greatest successes come from having
the freedom to
fail we all know you don't get

lucky
too if I had to support my family

I was going to be fine if Facebook
